name: Storage Hub
author: TerrariaModder
description: Unified storage access, crafting, and item management. Access all your chests from one place.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.description: Master toggle for the Storage Hub mod. When disabled, storage access and the recipe browser keybind do nothing.

blockHotbarFromCrafting.label: Protect Hotbar
blockHotbarFromCrafting.description: Prevent items in your hotbar (slots 1-10) from being consumed by crafting recipes in the Storage Hub.

recursiveCrafting.label: Recursive Crafting
recursiveCrafting.description: Auto-craft missing intermediate materials from stored items. E.g. auto-smelt bars when crafting something that needs them.

recursiveCraftingDepth.label: Recursive Depth
recursiveCraftingDepth.description: Maximum depth for recursive sub-crafting. 0 = unlimited, 1 = one level of sub-crafting, 2-5 = deeper chains.

dedicatedBlocksOnly.label: Dedicated Blocks Only
dedicatedBlocksOnly.description: When enabled, only Storage Unit blocks are registered into the storage network.
